description: Concatenates two strings with an optional separator to combine two values into one string (eg, fullname is firstname + space + lastname)
label: Concat String

options.name: left
options.label: Left
options.info: The left part of the string

options.name: separator
options.label: Separator
options.info: Optional separator between left and right part

options.name: right
options.label: Right
options.info: The right part of the string

options.name: result
options.label: Result
options.info: The result as the concatenated string
